course_title: Special Studies History of Art: Soviet Avant-Garde
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 25 / Seats Avail: 25Waitlist Total: 0
course_description: Advanced seminars dealing with various specialized problems in the history of art from antiquity to modern times, such as individual artists, genres (e.g. portraiture, landscape); themes (e.g. theory, iconography); artistic movements and museum studies. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
